name: df-enr
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5
body: |- wceq(cer, copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cxp(cnp, cnp)), wcel(cv(s1), cxp(cnp, cnp))), wex(s2, wex(s3, wex(s4, wex(s5, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(s1), cop(cv(s4), cv(s5)))), wceq(co(cv(s2), cpp, cv(s5)), co(cv(s3), cpp, cv(s4)))))))))))
comment: Define equivalence relation for signed reals. This is a "temporary" set used in the construction of complex numbers ~ df-c , and is intended to be used only by the construction. From Proposition 9-4.1 of [Gleason] p. 126. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jul-1995.) (New usage is discouraged.)
